Comment: > “These are not isolated misses. They are consistent, directional, and embedded in the structure of how modern polls are conducted,”  This is completely correct. The same pollsters claiming Trump is experiencing a “free fall” in favorability are the same ones who had Kamala Harris beating Trump in every single poll for months and look how that turned out. It’s not a mistake or even incompetence at this point; it’s intentional dishonestly.   Let’s be honest though, these polls aren’t for us or even for the majority of Americans. These “polls” are for the gullible, ignorant few who still believe these outlets still have even a shred of credibility left.
